name: atom-react-native-autocomplete
description: React-Native autocompletion for Atom text editor!
readme:
# atom-react-native-autocomplete package React-Native autocompletion for Atom text editor! Only supports the suffix for `.js` and `.jsx` files. ## Install Using `apm`: ``` apm install atom-react-native-autocomplete ``` Or search for `atom-react-native-autocomplete` in Atom settings view.
Potentially wait for further installs (just `apm install language-javascript-jsx` if its not there already).
## Options - #### prefix AutoComplete feature the string parsing rules *Default:* `React`
![demo](http://7oxfk1.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/atom-react-native-autocomplete-demo.gif)
